title: nIyE parAmukhamAyin
sahitya:
nIyE parAmukhamAyin jagam tanil nAyEn gati Edaiyaa pANDurangA


anupallavi

  tAyE maghavai marandAl enna sheivadu
 sharaNam sharaNam enru kadarum aDimaiyiDam (neeyE)


caraNam    pAril piranda uyirkkellAm shiranda uyir paghutthrivuLLa nara
 janmam tandAi idilum tIrAk-kavalai samsAra vilangai mATTi
 tighaikka sheidAi enakku tAyum tandaiyumAna
